snippet: Fatal school bus accidents are common in India.
abstract: Fatal school bus accidents are common in India.
lead_paragraph: “On the day Japneet Singh died, his father dressed him neatly in his crisp school uniform for picture day at his nursery school,” Sruthi Gottipati wrote in The New York Times. Japneet, 4,  was crushed beneath the wheels of his school bus as he exited it, she wrote.

headline.main: The Road to the Schoolhouse Proves Perilous for India’s Young
